scripts.start: concurrently -n gateway,auth,billing,comm,customer,healthcare,partner,petcare -c blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan,red,white,gray "npm run start --workspace api-gateway" "npm run start --workspace auth-service" "npm run start --workspace billing-service" "npm run start --workspace communication-service" "npm run start --workspace customer-service" "npm run start --workspace healthcare-service" "npm run start --workspace partner-service" "npm run start --workspace petcare-service"
